home.text: Coming into this game, Aris has picked up 5 points from the last 5 games, both home and away. That's 1 points per game on average. BTTS has landed in just 2 of those games. Aris has scored 3 times in the last 5 fixtures.
Superb stuff from Aris at home, where they are currently unbeaten in 6 games. Can they go another game without defeat?

Things have not been going that well in front of goal for Aris recently, with the side failing to score in 2 of the last 5 games. Will the manager change his tactics today, or throw in another forward?
Just 2 of the last 5 games for Aris has ended with both teams scoring. They have won 1 of those 5 games. Overall, BTTS has landed in 8/17 games for Aris this season.

away.text: Coming into this game, Levadiakos has picked up 13 points from the last 5 games, both home and away. That's 2.6 points per game on average. BTTS has landed in an intriguing 3 of those games. Levadiakos has scored 12 times in the last 5 fixtures.
Superb stuff from Levadiakos away from home, where they are currently unbeaten in 6 games. Can they go another game without defeat?
Scoring is not an issue for Levadiakos when they play away from home. They have scored in the last 8 games they have played on the road. Can Aris stop this run?
Momentum is really building for Levadiakos as they have now gone 5 games without losing. They have won 4 of the last 5 games they have played.
It's possible we will see a couple of goals here, with the last 14 games for Levadiakos ending with 2 goals or more being scored.
Levadiakos is unbeaten in the last 5 games coming into this fixture against Aris, having won 4 and drawn 1. They have scored 12 goals in those 5 games.
In the last 5 matches for Levadiakos, 3 of those games has ended with both teams scoring. This season 11 matches (65% of all matches) involving Levadiakos has seen BTTS landing.
It's likely that Levadiakos will score today, as they have netted in the last 14 games coming into this one and have scored 12 goals in the last five games.
